title: Private Balcony/Patio, Walk-In Closets, Upgraded Hardware
map_address: 3701 Towne Crossing Blvd. near Driftwood Dr
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to The Place Apartments!', 'When you are searching for modern living apartments in Mesquite, Texas, there is only one place you will want to be - The Place Apartments!', 'Convenient to I-30 and I-635, you will have easy access to Dallas and the entire Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex.', 'Enjoy and take a dip in our sparkling swimming pool or relax and tan on our pool lounge area.', 'Use our business center and stay connected.', 'Get fit, and re-energized in our expanded fitness studio.', 'Enjoy renovated, modern style 1 and 2 spacious bedroom apartment homes.', "We're a pet friendly community and welcome your fur friends.", 'Directly across the street, you have your choice of restaurants, including Razzos Cajun Cafe, Sports City Cafe, Outback Steakhouse, and El Fenix.', 'Just around the corner, you will find a variety of shops, grocery stores, and other businesses.', 'Town East Mall is also close to The Place Apartments.', 'Call us to schedule your appointment today, your new home awaits!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 510 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Air Conditioning', '- Heating', '- Ice Maker', '- Private Balcony/Patio', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package', '- Two Inch Blinds', '- Designer Lighting', '- Upgraded Hardware', '- Fireplace', '- Modern Interior Paint Finishes', '- Dishwasher', '- Disposal', '- Linen Closet', '- Dining Room', '- Built-In Bookshelves', '- Full Size & Stackable Washer/Dryer Connections', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring', '- Walk-In Closets', 'Community Amenities', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Professional On-Site Management', '- Convenient Online Payments', '- New Online Services', '- New Pool Lounge Area', '- 2 Clothes Care Centers', '- Outdoor Kitchens', '- Leash-Free Dog Park', '- 24- Hour Fitness Studio', '- Package Receiving', '- Valet Trash Pickup', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome a max of 2 pets (cats/dogs) per apartment home.', 'There is a $250 pet fee per pet (non-refundable) and $500 pet deposit per pet (non-refundable).', 'Pet rent is $10 per pet per month.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited (Pit-bull, Rottweiler, Chow, etc.).', 'Picture of pet and shots required.', 'For more information, please call our Leasing Center.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Place', '3701 Towne Crossing Blvd., Mesquite, TX, 75150', 'k66DCkWYO']
